Description: Lip sherd of Attic red-figured pottery bell-krater; interior: reserved band at rim,glazed below; top of lip glazed; on outside laurel band; inscription on top of rim.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of the Dioskouroi (Naukratis), Inside the temenos.
Curator's comments: Almost certainly from same vase as 1910,0222.179, with the dedicator's name. Zenon.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXV, no. 684)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0189) (Phase 1)
